document_data.name: Thomd
document_data.mainbody: '''Thomd''' was the innkeep for the [[Wanton Wyvern]] inn near [[Hullack Forest]], [[Cormyr]], in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Thomd was a tall, battered-looking man.{{cite book/Crown of Fire/TPB 2002|129-130|7}}
document_data.Personality: He was unkind to [[Baergasra]] and insisted that they'd never let a leper inside, because the place was clean.
document_data.Activities: Thomd was responsible for letting people into the Wanton Wyvern late in the evenings and for barring the gate.
document_data.History: Late in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}, Thomd opened the Wanton Wyvern one evening to a group of travelers including [[Shandril Shessair]], [[Narm Tamaraith]], [[Mirt]], and [[Delg Ironstar]]. After they were ambushed by local [[Zhentarim]] bullyblades, Narm required healing from Baergasra. Though Thomd tried to evict her in the aftermath, she turned out not to be an actual leper, but a [[Harper]] in disguise. He drew her a bath.
